attributes.action: put the parents of any underage arranged marriage on the sex-offenders register
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Arranging marriages for under-age children (in UK law) amounts to paedophiles by proxy.

These families should be subject to standard UK child abuse/paedophile laws, including putting them on the sex offenders register.

People living in, and enjoying the freedoms of British society should abide by the Laws.
